itunes:title: Lent Week 6 with Dr. Danny Hays
title: Lent Week 6 with Dr. Danny Hays
description:
Join us for the sixth week in the book of Ezekiel as Raechel and Amanda talk with Old Testament professor, Dr. Danny Hays. Together, they dig into the nitty gritty details of hope found in the concluding chapters of Ezekiel. Whether talking about the dimensions of the temple or land allotments, Dr. Hays constantly points us back to the emphasis all of Ezekiel has been building on—the presence of God. 

As we prepare for Holy Week, listen in as they constantly point out the themes in Ezekiel we see throughout Scripture from Genesis to Revelation. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent 2022: Come to Life collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-week-6-with-dr-danny-hays
content:encoded:

Whether talking about the dimensions of the temple or land allotments, Dr. Hays constantly points us back to the emphasis all of Ezekiel has been building on—the presence of God. 

As we prepare for Holy Week, listen in as they constantly point out the themes in Ezekiel we see throughout Scripture from Genesis to Revelation.
